alert.note: Alert for Kodiak Island (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 09 at 3:03PM AKST until February 10 at 9:00AM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 9 AM AKST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. Visibility as low as one half mile at times. * WHERE...Kodiak City. * WHEN...From 1 AM to 9 AM AKST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will develop around Kodiak City by early morning Friday. Easterly winds will also increase through early Friday morning as a frontal system moves toward the region. Snow may be heavy at times. The snow is expected to mix with and changeover to rain mid to late Friday morning as temperatures climb into the mid to upper 30s.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
